eventDecorators.name: AppealDecision
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: AppealPossible
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

eventDecorators.name: DisputeCreation
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result.

functionDecorators.name: appeal
functionDecorators.description: Appeal a ruling. Note that it has to be called before the arbitrator contract calls rule.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the dispute to be appealed.

parameterDecorators.name: _extraData
parameterDecorators.description: Can be used to give extra info on the appeal.

functionDecorators.name: appealPeriod
functionDecorators.description: Compute the start and end of the dispute's current or next appeal period, if possible. If not known or appeal is impossible: should return (0, 0).

functionDecorators.name: createDispute
functionDecorators.description: Create a dispute. Must be called by the arbitrable contract. Must be paid at least arbitrationCost(_extraData).

parameterDecorators.name: _choices
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of choices the arbitrator can make in this dispute.

parameterDecorators.name: _extraData
parameterDecorators.description: Can be used to give additional info on the dispute to be created.

functionDecorators.name: currentRuling
functionDecorators.description: Return the current ruling of a dispute. This is useful for parties to know if they should appeal.

returnDecorators.name: ruling
returnDecorators.description: The ruling which has been given or the one which will be given if there is no appeal.

functionDecorators.name: disputeStatus
functionDecorators.description: Return the status of a dispute.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: ID of the dispute to rule.
